title.en: Guest Shift by Guangzhou's champion bartender couple in Papuwa
title.zh: 广州冠军夫妻档调酒师接管Papuwa!

description.en: Papuwa Chengdu proudly presents Guest Shift Night, featuring award-winning mixologists from Guangzhou! Join us as champion bartenders 44 from CANTINA AAH and Kaka from IBARUS take over our bar for one special evening. This talented duo will showcase their signature cocktails, blending innovative techniques with a creative mix of ingredients including chili, seafood, grilled elements, exotic spices, and fresh fruits and herbs. Experience their unique personal styles and award-winning creations on April 12, 2025, from 9:00 PM to midnight at our Jinjiang District location. Don't miss this extraordinary cocktail journey!
description.zh: 成都Papuwa隆重呈现客座调酒师之夜，特邀广州顶尖调酒大师驾临！广州CANTINA AAH的44和广州IBARUS的卡卡，这对荣获多项全国及地区冠军的夫妻调酒师将为您呈现独具匠心的鸡尾酒体验。他们将运用辣椒、海鲜、炙烤元素、香料以及新鲜果蔬，创造出极具个人特色的独特调酒作品。2025年4月12日晚9点至午夜，锦江区东顺城南路的Papuwa期待您的光临，共享这场非凡的味蕾盛宴！

description.en: We are honored to welcome Crawford, the mastermind behind Paal and Gallows Humor, who will craft an intoxicating early spring dreamscape. Paal is known for its minimalist design and innovative cocktail philosophy, while Gallows Humor is famous for its dark humor style and bold cocktail explorations. This is an excellent opportunity to experience two distinctly different beverage systems while exploring the boundless spirit of freedom.
description.zh: 这次我们很荣幸邀请到 Paal 和 Gallows Humor 的主理人 Crawford So，他将在春季为我们编织一场初春的微醺梦境。Paal 以其简约主义设计和创新调酒理念著称，而 Gallows Humor 则以其黑暗幽默风格和大胆的鸡尾酒探索闻名。这是一次体验两种截然不同饮品体系的绝佳机会，让我们共同探索无边界的自由精神。
